summary: GOODYEAR MARATHON TRAILER TIRES MADE IN CHINA.  FIRST ONE BLEW OUT AT 10,900 MILES.  THE SECOND ONE BLEW OUT 200 MILES LATER CAUSING DAMAGE TO THE TRAILER BODY.  THE TIRES WERE PROPERLY INFLATED TO 50 PSI.  THE TRAILER WAS WELL UNDER THE LOAD LIMIT.  BOTH BLOWOUTS OCCURRED ON AN INTERSTATE HIGHWAY UNDER THE POSTED SPEED LIMIT.
